code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var getTitle=function getTitle(note){var title=note.body.split("\n")[0];if(title.length>45){return title.slice(0,30)+"...";}return title;};var getDate=function getDate(note){return new Date(note.updated).toLocaleDateString();};var getContent=function getContent(note){var title=getTitle(note);var content=note.body.replaceAll("\n"," ");content=content.replaceAll(title,"");if(content.length>45){return content.slice(0,45)+"...";}else{return content;}};var ListItem=function ListItem(_ref){var note=_ref.note;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/note/".concat(note.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["hello: ",getTitle(note)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:getDate(note)}),getContent(note)]})]})});};export default ListItem;
